name: Chatmarklet
body:
# chatmarklet
Bookmarklet for StackOverflow chat
Drag the following link to your bookmarks:  
    [CHATMARKLET](javascript:(function(){var script=document.createElement('script');script.type='text/javascript';script.src='https://rawgit.com/fuho/18a564dea342088ce401/raw/8d82696040090b10584fa8105d6293292471140b/Room15chat.js';document.head.appendChild(script);})())  
  
Then click it while in chat.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
